title: Moetan
synopsis: Ink Nijihara is a girl in high school. Unfortunately her crush Nao Tezuka barely recognizes her. To make matters worse, she is very short. Now Ink meets a duck and becomes a "mahou shoujo" and teaches Nao english in disguise.
voices: ['Tamura, Yukari', 'Tomatsu, Haruka', 'Onosaka, Masaya', 'Nazuka, Kaori', 'Hiyama, Nobuyuki', 'Ueda, Yuuji', 'Kaneda, Tomoko', 'Nakata, Jouji', 'Morinaga, Rika', 'Iguchi, Yuka']
staff: [['Kawaguchi, Keiichirou', ['Director', ' Episode Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Matsuoka, Hiroki', ['Sound Director']], ['Ikehata, Hiroshi', ['Episode Director']], ['Hashiguchi, Yousuke', ['Episode Director']]]
